## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G38120](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G38120)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>4-CL8, 4CL8</u>
- **Gene Name:** 4-COUMARATE-COA LIGASE 8
- **Description:**   AMP-dependent synthetase and ligase family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
